pethi mangin aushadha dena wita wadi aushadha mathrawak diya yuthu athara, me hethuwen athuru aabadha wadipura siduwe.nisi upades paridi aushadha ganimen aduma roginata athiwana wasi.roga lakshana palanaya wimen dainika katayuthu, pasal yama ha rakiyawa badhawakin thorawa kala haki we.rogaya nisiyakarawa palanaya nokirimen jiwithayata ella wiya haki tharjana, hadisi prathikara sandaha rohal gatha wiya yuthu awastha awama we.rogaya manawa palanaya wu wita rohalwala bahira rogi ansha ha paudgalika anshaye prathikara sandaha waya wana mudal ithiri kara gatha hakiya.rogaya palanaya wi athiwita sharirika kriyakarakam kirime athi hakiyawa nisa jiwithaya wadath paladayikawa ha thrupthimathwa gatha kala hakiya.rogaya palanayak athi wita oba ganna aahara, snanaya kirima wani da kerehi athi simawak boho durata adu kara gatha hakiya.adumata ganna aushadhamema aushadha prathikara warga rogiyagen roga lakshana anuwa waidyawaraya wisin niyama karanu atha.aduma walakwana aushadha (niwarana aushadha)me wargaye aushadha mangin husma ganna nalawala athi idimuma ha adhi sanwedithawa adu karayi.mewa aduma roga lakshana palanaya karana athara jiwithayata aduma uthsanna wima nisa athiwana awadanama adu karayi.ema aushadha stiroyid aushadha kandayata ayath wana athara eewa obe penahaluwalata athulu kirimata hondama kramaya inhelarayayi.
umbae juliyat ada mala..!

me uda wu hirugoth wanshaye upan thun lowak sanaha wadala apa maha gauthama munirajun samma sambuddhathwayata path wi gewi yana 2600 wasarayi.2600 wana ee uthum wassana samaya da nobo da gewi awasan wiya.binara pun poho dinayen awasan wu was thun masa purawata lakwasi men ma lowasi bodu janaya anekawidha pin sithuwili sith sathan thula janitha karaganimin jiwitha santhanaya udesa mahaniya wu punya dharmayan rashiyak ras karagannata wiya.lakdiwa pura wisiri pathira pawathinna wu wehera wiharasthana asuru karaganimin palamu katina chiwaraya hewisi handa madhyaye, ali athun piriwaru maha peraharin, sadahathiyange sadu handa madhyaye wadamawa thun lowa puda sathkara labannata sudusu wuwan atharin agra wu thun lowak dinu ee bhagyawathun wahanse udesa ma puja karannata wiya.

wijith aananda da soyisa namathi sakakaruwan pas denaya.eeye perawaru 9.30 pamana balapitiya mahesthrath adhikaranaye adhikarana katayuthu aarambha kala athara ahungalla benthara polis sthana deke nadu rasak wibhagayata ganimen pasuwa adhikaranaye sira madiriye randawa siti karandeniya waidya prasad jayasinha mahathage ghathanaye sakakaruwan pas dena mahesthrathwaraya idiriyata pamunuwana ladi.karandeniya waidyawarayage naduwa kandawu awasthawe paminilla wenuwen peni siti nithignya lesli jayasinha mahatha waidya priyanka prasad jayasinha mahathage ghathanayata sambandha rajaye rasa parikshaka warthawa kadinamin idiripath karana lesa aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwata danum dena lesa illa sitiyeya.aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwe jyeshta niladhariyeku adhikaranaya amathamin kiya sitiye rajaye rasa parikshaka warthawa idiri dinaye di idiripath karana bawaya.
esema deshaka pilibanda sitha deshana kala suthra hatiyata ‘bhaddiya anurudda’ suthra idiripath kala hakiya.

chinaye kantan, kumin saha guwanso nagarawala shri lankawe manik welenda sal wiwrutha kirimata china baladharin ekanga wi thibe.me anuwa rathnapuraye manik sandaha nawa jathyanthara welandapolak wiwrutha wana bawa palath pradhana amathya mahipala herath mahatha pawasayi.thama pasugiya dinaka chinaye sancharayaka yedemin sabaragamuwa palathe aarthika ha adhyapana katayuthu nanwalima sandaha china baladharin samanga pawathi sakachchawaka di kala illimak anuwa rathnapuraye manik walata chinaye welandapola wiwrutha wana bawa sabaragamuwa karmantha ha wanija mandalaye niladharin pirisak samanga pawathi sakachchawaka di pradhana amathyawaraya ihatha thorathuru anawaranaya kaleya.ema china sancharaye prathipalayak lesa sabaragamuwa palathata china rajayen prathilabha rasak laba di athayida pradhana amathiwaraya mehidi sandahan kaleya.palathe daru dariyanta china bhashawa iganwima sandaha china guru pirisak danatamath pasal hatharaka china bhashawa iganwime katayuthu aarambha kara athayi da pradhana amathyawaraya me sakachchawe di helidaraw kaleya.undugoda saha karapincha saththwa gowipola sanwardhanaya kirima sandaha china wisheshagnya kandayamak pasugiyada diwayinata pamina mulika adhyayanayak sidu kara athayida mehidi mahipala herath pradhana amathyawaraya kiweya.mema sakachchawata sabaragamuwa wanija mandalaye sabhapathi darshana rupasinha , ehi adhyakshawarun wana ajith ranasinha, nimal dayawansha, chamli gunasili saha rathnapura manik wyaparikayange sangamaye upa sabhapathi yu.ji. chandrasena yana mahathwaruda sahabhagi wuha..
horek, man paharannek liyana hondama blog adawiya malak wage hada punchi dila rawi ayiya nathi wunata sammanaye poto atha.
